item.description:
So how do you deal with the physical side of dating? When should you be affectionate, kiss or start to be sexual! Who initiates? When do you talk about "safe sex," sexual boundaries, how far to go, what does it mean? Do you kiss on the first date? second? Do you talk about afterwards about what happened? Expectations for the future? Different preferences for physical contact? How do you know what is safe emotionally for you or the other person?

We'll address all the issues by a relationship coach and therapist who has worked with couples for 30 years and who is also trained in the area of sexuality.

Sliding scale from $20-40.

Herb Pearce
781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
also www.meetup.com/Enneagram-Group
item.name: Dating and Mating - The Physical Side of Dating!
